item.description:
location: 41 Temple St. Room 403, Boston, MA

Join the Suffolk University Libertarians, Suffolk University NORML and the Suffolk University Economics Club as we host Harvard University Economics Professor Jeffrey Miron! Miron will be leading us through a discussion about how the War on Drugs has been a complete failure from an economic perspective.

A FREE lunch will be provided, featuring a sandwich platter, chicken wings, salad, and chocolate covered strawberries :)

This luncheon will be held in Room 403 of the Donahue building, and entry is FREE and open to the public!

If you have any questions, email Suffolk.Libertarians@gmail.com

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Jeffrey Miron - Why The War On Drugs Has Been A Complete Failure
